full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DBU PHAR GYI DGA' GNAD 'GA' ZHIG LAS BRTZAMS PA'I DRI BA DANG, DRIS LAN RAGS BSDUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES PHAR PHYIN GYI DKA' GNAD 'GA' ZHIG NAS BRTZAMS TE DRI BA YID BZHIN 'GRUB PA'I BSAM 'PHEL BEE t'URYA'I RIGS CHEN PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SA MTHAR SKYES PA'I DGE SBYONGS KYI SHA TSUGS CAN RGYAL RDO DGE BSHES BLO BZANG TSE RING MING BAS BRIS PA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG ,)
